00055 CellStoreV0::CellStoreV0(Filesystem *filesys)
00056   : m_filesys(filesys), m_fd(-1), m_filename(), m_compressor(0), m_buffer(0),
00057     m_fix_index_buffer(0), m_var_index_buffer(0), m_memory_consumed(0),
00058     m_outstanding_appends(0), m_offset(0), m_last_key(0), m_file_length(0),
00059     m_disk_usage(0), m_file_id(0), m_uncompressed_blocksize(0),
00060     m_bloom_filter_mode(BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED), m_bloom_filter(0),
00061     m_bloom_filter_items(0) {
00062 
00063   m_file_id = FileBlockCache::get_next_file_id();
00064   assert(sizeof(float) == 4);
00065 }

00067 
00068 CellStoreV0::~CellStoreV0() {
00069   try {
00070     delete m_compressor;
00071 
00072     if (m_bloom_filter != 0) {
00073       delete m_bloom_filter;
00074     }
00075     if (m_bloom_filter_items != 0) {
00076       delete m_bloom_filter_items;
00077     }
00078     if (m_fd != -1)
00079       m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00080   }
00081   catch (Exception &e) {
00082     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00083   }
00084   if (m_memory_consumed)
00085     Global::memory_tracker.subtract(m_memory_consumed);
00086 }

00111 void
00112 CellStoreV0::create(const char *fname, size_t max_entries,
00113                     PropertiesPtr &props) {
00114   uint32_t blocksize = props->get("blocksize", uint32_t(0));
00115   String compressor = props->get("compressor", String());
00116 
00117   assert(Config::properties); // requires Config::init* first
00118 
00119   if (blocksize == 0)
00120     blocksize = Config::get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.CellStore"
00121                                 ".DefaultBlockSize");
00122   if (compressor.empty())
00123     compressor = Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer.CellStore"
00124                                  ".DefaultCompressor");
00125   if (!props->has("bloom-filter-mode")) {
00126     // probably not called from AccessGroup
00127     Schema::parse_bloom_filter(Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer"
00128         ".CellStore.DefaultBloomFilter"), props);
00129   }
00130 
00131   m_buffer.reserve(blocksize*4);
00132 
00133   m_max_entries = max_entries;
00134 
00135   m_fd = -1;
00136   m_offset = 0;
00137   m_last_key = 0;
00138   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00139   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00140 
00141   m_uncompressed_data = 0.0;
00142   m_compressed_data = 0.0;
00143 
00144   m_trailer.clear();
00145   m_trailer.blocksize = blocksize;
00146   m_uncompressed_blocksize = blocksize;
00147 
00148   m_filename = fname;
00149 
00150   m_start_row = "";
00151   m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00152 
00153   m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00154       compressor, m_compressor_args);
00155 
00156   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00157       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type,
00158       m_compressor_args);
00159 
00160   m_fd = m_filesys->create(m_filename, true, -1, -1, -1);
00161 
00162   m_bloom_filter_mode = props->get<BloomFilterMode>("bloom-filter-mode");
00163   m_max_approx_items = props->get_i32("max-approx-items");
00164   m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob = props->get_f64("false-positive");
00165 
00166   if (m_bloom_filter_mode != BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED) {
00167     m_bloom_filter_items = new BloomFilterItems(); // aproximator items
00168   }
00169   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"bloom-filter-mode="<< m_bloom_filter_mode
00170       <<" max-approx-items="<< m_max_approx_items <<" false-positive="
00171       << m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob << HT_END;
00172 }

00174 
00175 void CellStoreV0::create_bloom_filter(bool is_approx) {
00176   assert(!m_bloom_filter && m_bloom_filter_items);
00177 
00178   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Creating new BloomFilter for CellStore '"
00179     << m_filename <<"' for "<< (is_approx ? "estimated " : "")
00180     << m_trailer.num_filter_items << " items"<< HT_END;
00181 
00182   m_bloom_filter = new BloomFilter(m_trailer.num_filter_items,
00183       m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob);
00184 
00185   foreach(const Blob &blob, *m_bloom_filter_items)
00186     m_bloom_filter->insert(blob.start, blob.size);
00187 
00188   delete m_bloom_filter_items;
00189   m_bloom_filter_items = 0;
00190 
00191   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Created new BloomFilter for CellStore '"
00192     << m_filename <<"'"<< HT_END;
00193 }

00195 
00196 void CellStoreV0::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00197   EventPtr event_ptr;
00198   DynamicBuffer zbuf;
00199 
00200   if (key.revision > m_trailer.revision)
00201     m_trailer.revision = key.revision;
00202 
00203   if (m_buffer.fill() > m_uncompressed_blocksize) {
00204     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00205 
00206     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00207 
00208     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00209     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00210     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00211     m_buffer.clear();
00212 
00213     uint64_t llval = ((uint64_t)m_trailer.blocksize
00214         * (uint64_t)m_uncompressed_data) / (uint64_t)m_compressed_data;
00215     m_uncompressed_blocksize = (uint32_t)llval;
00216 
00217     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00218       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00219         if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE)
00220           HT_THROWF(Hypertable::Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00221              "Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00222              Hypertable::Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00223         HT_THROWF(event_ptr->error,
00224                   "Problem writing to DFS file '%s'", m_filename.c_str());
00225       }
00226       m_outstanding_appends--;
00227     }
00228 
00229     size_t zlen = zbuf.fill();
00230     StaticBuffer send_buf(zbuf);
00231 
00232     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00233     catch (Exception &e) {
00234       HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem writing to DFS file '%s'",
00235                  m_filename.c_str());
00236     }
00237     m_outstanding_appends++;
00238     m_offset += zlen;
00239   }
00240 
00241   size_t value_len = value.length();
00242 
00243   m_buffer.ensure(key.length + value_len);
00244 
00245   m_last_key.ptr = m_buffer.add_unchecked(key.serial.ptr, key.length);
00246   m_buffer.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00247 
00248   if (m_bloom_filter_mode != BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED) {
00249     if (m_trailer.total_entries < m_max_approx_items) {
00250       m_bloom_filter_items->insert(key.row, key.row_len);
00251 
00252       if (m_bloom_filter_mode == BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS_COLS)
00253         m_bloom_filter_items->insert(key.row, key.row_len + 2);
00254 
00255       if (m_trailer.total_entries == m_max_approx_items - 1) {
00256         m_trailer.num_filter_items = (size_t)(((double)m_max_entries
00257             / (double)m_max_approx_items) * m_bloom_filter_items->size());
00258         create_bloom_filter(true);
00259       }
00260     }
00261     else {
00262       assert(!m_bloom_filter_items && m_bloom_filter);
00263 
00264       m_bloom_filter->insert(key.row);
00265 
00266       if (m_bloom_filter_mode == BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS_COLS)
00267         m_bloom_filter->insert(key.row, key.row_len + 2);
00268     }
00269   }
00270 
00271   m_trailer.total_entries++;
00272 }

00274 
00275 void CellStoreV0::finalize(TableIdentifier *table_identifier) {
00276   EventPtr event_ptr;
00277   size_t zlen;
00278   DynamicBuffer zbuf(0);
00279   size_t len;
00280   uint8_t *base;
00281   SerializedKey key;
00282   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00283 
00284   if (m_buffer.fill() > 0) {
00285     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00286 
00287     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00288 
00289     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00290     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00291     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00292 
00293     zlen = zbuf.fill();
00294     send_buf = zbuf;
00295 
00296     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00297       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00298         HT_THROWF(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00299                   "Problem finalizing CellStore file '%s' : %s",
00300                   m_filename.c_str(),
00301                   Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00302       m_outstanding_appends--;
00303     }
00304 
00305     m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00306 
00307     m_outstanding_appends++;
00308     m_offset += zlen;
00309   }
00310 
00311   m_buffer.free();
00312 
00313   m_trailer.fix_index_offset = m_offset;
00314   if (m_uncompressed_data == 0)
00315     m_trailer.compression_ratio = 1.0;
00316   else
00317     m_trailer.compression_ratio = m_compressed_data / m_uncompressed_data;
00318   m_trailer.version = 0;
00319 
00323   base = m_fix_index_buffer.release(&len);
00324   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00325   m_fix_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00326   delete [] base;
00327   base = m_var_index_buffer.release(&len);
00328   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00329   m_var_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00330   delete [] base;
00331 
00335   {
00336     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00337     m_compressor->deflate(m_fix_index_buffer, zbuf, header);
00338   }
00339 
00340   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00341   send_buf = zbuf;
00342 
00343   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00344 
00345   m_outstanding_appends++;
00346   m_offset += zlen;
00347 
00351   {
00352     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00353     m_trailer.var_index_offset = m_offset;
00354     m_compressor->deflate(m_var_index_buffer, zbuf, header);
00355   }
00356 
00357   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00358   send_buf = zbuf;
00359 
00360   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00361 
00362   m_outstanding_appends++;
00363   m_offset += zlen;
00364 
00365   // write filter_offset
00366   m_trailer.filter_offset = m_offset;
00367 
00368   // if bloom_items haven't been spilled to create a bloom filter yet, do it
00369   if (m_bloom_filter_mode != BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED) {
00370     if (m_bloom_filter_items) {
00371       m_trailer.num_filter_items = m_bloom_filter_items->size();
00372       create_bloom_filter();
00373     }
00374     assert(!m_bloom_filter_items && m_bloom_filter);
00375 
00376     m_bloom_filter->serialize(send_buf);
00377     m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00378 
00379     m_outstanding_appends++;
00380     m_offset += m_bloom_filter->size();
00381   }
00382 
00384   m_index_map32.load(m_fix_index_buffer, m_var_index_buffer,
00385                      m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00386   record_split_row( m_index_map32.middle_key() );
00387 
00388   // deallocate fix index data
00389   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00390 
00391   // Add table information
00392   m_trailer.table_id = table_identifier->id;
00393   m_trailer.table_generation = table_identifier->generation;
00394 
00395   // write trailer
00396   zbuf.clear();
00397   zbuf.reserve(m_trailer.size());
00398   m_trailer.serialize(zbuf.ptr);
00399   zbuf.ptr += m_trailer.size();
00400 
00401   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00402   send_buf = zbuf;
00403 
00404   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf);
00405 
00406   m_outstanding_appends++;
00407   m_offset += zlen;
00408 
00410   m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00411 
00413   m_file_length = m_offset;
00414 
00416   m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00417 
00418   m_disk_usage = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00419 
00420   m_memory_consumed = sizeof(CellStoreV0) + m_index_map32.memory_used();
00421   if (m_bloom_filter)
00422     m_memory_consumed += m_bloom_filter->size();
00423   Global::memory_tracker.add(m_memory_consumed);
00424 
00425   delete m_compressor;
00426   m_compressor = 0;
00427 
00428 }
00429 
00430 
00431 void CellStoreV0::add_index_entry(const SerializedKey key, uint32_t offset) {
00432 
00433   size_t key_len = key.length();
00434   m_var_index_buffer.ensure(key_len);
00435   memcpy(m_var_index_buffer.ptr, key.ptr, key_len);
00436   m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key_len;
00437 
00438   // Serialize offset into fix index buffer
00439   m_fix_index_buffer.ensure(sizeof(offset));
00440   memcpy(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, &offset, sizeof(offset));
00441   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00442 
00443   m_trailer.index_entries++;
00444 }

00446 
00447 void
00448 CellStoreV0::open(const String &fname, const String &start_row,
00449                   const String &end_row, int32_t fd, int64_t file_length,
00450                   CellStoreTrailer *trailer) {
00451   m_filename = fname;
00452   m_start_row = start_row;
00453   m_end_row = end_row;
00454   m_fd = fd;
00455   m_file_length = file_length;
00456 
00457   CellStoreTrailerV0 *trailer_v0 = static_cast<CellStoreTrailerV0 *>(trailer);
00458 
00459   m_trailer = *trailer_v0;
00460 
00462   HT_ASSERT(m_trailer.version == 0);
00463 
00464   if (!(m_trailer.fix_index_offset < m_trailer.var_index_offset &&
00465         m_trailer.var_index_offset < m_file_length))
00466     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_CELLSTORE,
00467               "Bad index offsets in CellStore trailer fix=%u, var=%u, "
00468               "length=%llu, file='%s'", m_trailer.fix_index_offset,
00469               m_trailer.var_index_offset, (Llu)m_file_length, fname.c_str());
00470 
00471   load_index();
00472 }
00473 
00474 
00475 void CellStoreV0::load_index() {
00476   uint32_t amount, index_amount;
00477   uint32_t len = 0;
00478   BlockCompressionHeader header;
00479   SerializedKey key;
00480   bool inflating_fixed=true;
00481   bool second_try = false;
00482 
00483   m_compressor = create_block_compression_codec();
00484 
00485   amount = index_amount = m_trailer.filter_offset
00486                           - m_trailer.fix_index_offset;
00487 
00488  try_again:
00489 
00490   try {
00491     DynamicBuffer buf(amount);
00492 
00493     if (second_try)
00494       reopen_fd();
00495 
00497     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, buf.ptr, amount, m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00498 
00499     if (len != amount)
00500       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error loading index for "
00501                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %d but only got %d",
00502                 m_filename.c_str(), amount, len);
00504     buf.ptr += (m_trailer.var_index_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00505     m_compressor->inflate(buf, m_fix_index_buffer, header);
00506 
00507     inflating_fixed = false;
00508 
00509     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00510       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, m_filename);
00511 
00513     DynamicBuffer vbuf(0, false);
00514     amount = m_trailer.filter_offset - m_trailer.var_index_offset;
00515     vbuf.base = buf.ptr;
00516     vbuf.ptr = buf.ptr + amount;
00517 
00518     m_compressor->inflate(vbuf, m_var_index_buffer, header);
00519 
00520     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00521       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, m_filename);
00522   }
00523   catch (Exception &e) {
00524     String msg;
00525     if (inflating_fixed) {
00526       msg = String("Error inflating FIXED index for cellstore '")
00527             + m_filename + "'";
00528       HT_ERROR_OUT << msg << ": "<< e << HT_END;
00529     }
00530     else {
00531       msg = "Error inflating VARIABLE index for cellstore '" + m_filename + "'";
00532       HT_ERROR_OUT << msg << ": " <<  e << HT_END;
00533     }
00534     HT_ERROR_OUT << "pread(fd=" << m_fd << ", len=" << len << ", amount="
00535         << index_amount << ")\n" << HT_END;
00536     HT_ERROR_OUT << m_trailer << HT_END;
00537     if (second_try)
00538       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, msg);
00539     second_try = true;
00540     goto try_again;
00541   }
00542 
00544   m_index_map32.load(m_fix_index_buffer, m_var_index_buffer,
00545                      m_trailer.fix_index_offset, m_start_row, m_end_row);
00546   record_split_row( m_index_map32.middle_key() );
00547 
00548   // instantiate a bloom filter and read in the bloom filter bits.
00549   // If num_filter_items in trailer is 0, means bloom_filter is disabled..
00550   if (m_trailer.num_filter_items != 0) {
00551       HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Creating new BloomFilter for CellStore '"
00552           << m_filename <<"' with "<< m_trailer.num_filter_items
00553           << " items"<< HT_END;
00554     m_bloom_filter = new BloomFilter(m_trailer.num_filter_items,
00555                                      m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob);
00556 
00557     amount = (m_file_length - m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.filter_offset;
00558     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, m_bloom_filter->ptr(), amount,
00559                              m_trailer.filter_offset);
00560 
00561     if (len != amount) {
00562       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Problem loading bloomfilter for"
00563                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %d but only got %d",
00564                 m_filename.c_str(), amount, len);
00565 
00566     }
00567   } else {
00568     assert((m_file_length - m_trailer.size()) == m_trailer.filter_offset);
00569   }
00570 
00571   m_disk_usage = m_index_map32.disk_used();
00572   
00573   m_memory_consumed = sizeof(CellStoreV0) + m_index_map32.memory_used();
00574   if (m_bloom_filter)
00575     m_memory_consumed += m_bloom_filter->size();
00576   Global::memory_tracker.add(m_memory_consumed);
00577 
00578   delete m_compressor;
00579   m_compressor = 0;
00580   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00581 }
00582 
00583 
00584 bool CellStoreV0::may_contain(ScanContextPtr &scan_context) {
00585   switch (m_bloom_filter_mode) {
00586     case BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS:
00587       return may_contain(scan_context->start_row);
00588     case BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS_COLS:
00589       if (may_contain(scan_context->start_row)) {
00590         SchemaPtr &schema = scan_context->schema;
00591         size_t rowlen = scan_context->start_row.length();
00592         boost::scoped_array<char> rowcol(new char[rowlen + 2]);
00593         memcpy(rowcol.get(), scan_context->start_row.c_str(), rowlen + 1);
00594 
00595         foreach(const char *col, scan_context->spec->columns) {
00596           uint8_t column_family_id = schema->get_column_family(col)->id;
00597           rowcol[rowlen + 1] = column_family_id;
00598 
00599           if (may_contain(rowcol.get(), rowlen + 2))
00600             return true;
00601         }
00602       }
00603       return false;
00604     case BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED:
00605       return true;
00606     default:
00607       HT_ASSERT(!"unpossible bloom filter mode!");
00608   }
00609   return false; // silence stupid compilers
00610 }
00611 
00612 
00613 bool CellStoreV0::may_contain(const void *ptr, size_t len) {
00614   assert(m_bloom_filter != 0);
00615   bool may_contain = m_bloom_filter->may_contain(ptr, len);
00616   return may_contain;
00617 }
00618 
00619 
00620 void CellStoreV0::display_block_info() {
00621   SerializedKey last_key;
00622   uint32_t last_offset = 0;
00623   uint32_t block_size;
00624   size_t i=0;
00625   for (CellStoreBlockIndexMap<uint32_t>::iterator iter = m_index_map32.begin();
00626        iter != m_index_map32.end(); ++iter) {
00627     if (last_key) {
00628       block_size = iter.value() - last_offset;
00629       cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size
00630            << " row=" << last_key.row() << endl;
00631       i++;
00632     }
00633     last_offset = iter.value();
00634     last_key = iter.key();
00635   }
00636   if (last_key) {
00637     block_size = m_trailer.filter_offset - last_offset;
00638     cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size
00639          << " row=" << last_key.row() << endl;
00640   }
00641 }
00642 
00643 
00644 void CellStoreV0::record_split_row(const SerializedKey key) {
00645   if (key.ptr) {
00646     std::string split_row = key.row();
00647     if (split_row > m_start_row && split_row < m_end_row)
00648       m_split_row = split_row;
00649   }
00650 }
